A sleek, minimalistic portfolio template thatâs fully customizable and completely free!
This theme combines simplicity with flexibility, giving you complete control over your design without compromising on style.
article:
This portfolio theme is designed with simplicity and customization in mind, offering a sleek and modern layout that is both visually appealing and easy to navigate.


With a focus on minimalism, this portfolio allows for an intuitive browsing experience, where visitors can quickly grasp the essence of your work. Itâs completely free, making it accessible to anyone looking to build a professional presence online.


Whether you're just starting your career or looking to refresh your online portfolio, this theme offers a flexible and no-cost solution that can evolve with your work. It's built to be fast, responsive, and user-friendly, making it a perfect choice for creatives who want to focus on what matters mostâshowcasing their skills and talent.

github.name: basic-portfolio-template
github.description: Portfolio template built with Astro and Tailwind CSS
